verses.verse: Wherefore, <S%G1352><s%> Having Left <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Discourse, <S%G3056><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Full Growth <S%G5047><s%> We Should Go On; <S%G5342><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> A Foundation <S%G2310><s%> Laying <S%G2598><s%> Of Repentance <S%G3341><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Works, <S%G2041><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

Of Washings <S%G909><s%> Of The Doctrine, <S%G1322><s%> Laying On <S%G1936><s%> And Of <S%G5037><s%> Of Hands, <S%G5495><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> And Of <S%G5037><s%> Of The Dead, <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Judgment <S%G2917><s%> Eternal; <S%G166><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Will We Do, <S%G4160><s%> If Indeed <S%G1437><s%> Permit <S%G2010><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G102><s%> For It Is Impossible, <S%G1063><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Once <S%G530><s%> Enlightened, <S%G5461><s%> <S%G1089><s%> And Who Tasted <S%G5037><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G1431><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heavenly, <S%G2032><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Partakers <S%G3353><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> Of The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> The Good <S%G2570><s%> Tasted <S%G1089><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Word <S%G4487><s%> <S%G1411><s%> And The Works Of <S%G5037><s%> Power Of The To Come <S%G3195><s%> Age, <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Who Fell Away, <S%G3895><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> To Renew <S%G340><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Repentance, <S%G3341><s%> Crucifying <S%G388><s%> For Themselves As They Do <S%G1438><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exposing Publicly. <S%G3856><s%>

<S%G1093><s%> For Ground <S%G1063><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Drank <S%G4095><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Often <S%G4178><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> Rain, <S%G5205><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Produces <S%G5088><s%> Herbage <S%G1008><s%> Fit <S%G2111><s%> For Those <S%G1565><s%> ' For Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> It Is Tilled, <S%G1090><s%> Partakes <S%G3335><s%> Of Blessing <S%G2129><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1627><s%> But That Bringing Forth <S%G1161><s%> Thorns <S%G173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thistles <S%G5146><s%> Is Rejected <S%G96><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Curse <S%G2671><s%> Near To, <S%G1451><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> End Is <S%G5056><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Burning. <S%G2740><s%>

<S%G3982><s%> But We Are Persuaded <S%G1161><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Better Things, <S%G2909><s%> And Things <S%G2532><s%> Connected With <S%G2192><s%> Salvation, <S%G4991><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> We Speak. <S%G2980><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Unrighteous Is <S%G94><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Forget <S%G1950><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Your Work <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Labour <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Love <S%G26><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Did Shew <S%G1731><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name, <S%G846><s%> Having Served <S%G1247><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Still Serving. <S%G1247><s%>

<S%G1937><s%> But We Desire <S%G1161><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> To Shew <S%G1731><s%> Diligence <S%G4710><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Full Assurance <S%G4136><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> Unto <S%G891><s%> The End; <S%G5056><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Sluggish <S%G3576><s%> Ye Be, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3402><s%> But Imitators <S%G1161><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Long Patience <S%G3115><s%> Inherit <S%G2816><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promises. <S%G1860><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For To Abraham <S%G11><s%> Having Promised <S%G1861><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Since <S%G1893><s%> ' By <S%G2596><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> He Had <S%G2192><s%> Greater <S%G3173><s%> To Swear, <S%G3660><s%> Swore <S%G3660><s%> ' By <S%G2596><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2229><s%> Surely <S%G3375><s%> Blessing <S%G2127><s%> I Will Bless <S%G2127><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Multiplying <S%G4129><s%> I Will Multiply <S%G4129><s%> Thee; <S%G4571><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Having Had Long Patience <S%G3114><s%> He Obtained <S%G2013><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promise. <S%G1860><s%>

Men <S%G444><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> By <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Greater <S%G3173><s%> Swear, <S%G3660><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Gainsaying <S%G485><s%> An End <S%G4009><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Confirmation Is <S%G951><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Oath. <S%G3727><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> Wherein <S%G3739><s%> More Abundantly <S%G4054><s%> Desiring <S%G1014><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Shew <S%G1925><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Heirs <S%G2818><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Promise <S%G1860><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unchangeableness <S%G276><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1012><s%> Of His Counsel, <S%G846><s%> Interposed <S%G3315><s%> By An Oath, <S%G3727><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Things <S%G4229><s%> Unchangeable, <S%G276><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which It Was <S%G3739><s%> Impossible <S%G102><s%> To Lie <S%G5574><s%> For God <S%G2316><s%> Strong <S%G2478><s%> Encouragment <S%G3874><s%> We Might Have <S%G2192><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Fled For Refuge <S%G2703><s%> To Lay Hold On <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Set Before Us <S%G4295><s%> Hope, <S%G1680><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> An Anchor <S%G45><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> Certain <S%G804><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Firm, <S%G949><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Entering <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Within <S%G2082><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Veil; <S%G2665><s%>

Where <S%G3699><s%> As Forerunner <S%G4274><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Order <S%G5010><s%> Of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%> A High Priest <S%G749><s%> Having Become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Forever. <S%G165><s%>
